content.html: So the government are telling nurses, to consider their patients before they go on strike. This comment is entirely insulting to all nurses. The government should consider the patients when they are setting the pay of those who are caring for them.
content.value:
So the government are telling nurses, to consider their patients before they go on strike.
This comment is entirely insulting to all nurses. The government should consider the patients when they are setting the pay of those who are caring for them.
